longBusinessSummary: Excel Realty N Infra Limited engages in the infrastructure, information technology, business process outsourcing, and general trading activities in India. The company provides customer care and inbound and outbound services, as well as handles the business relations of clients on their behalf. It also develops infrastructure facilities. The company was formerly known as Excel Infoways Limited and changed its name to Excel Realty N Infra Limited in May 2015. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
